EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Deal Registration for NCR Finance Program submitted for Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Deal_Registration__c.OwnerFullName},
Thank you for your recent Deal Registration submission. This message is to confirm your submission was received and will be sent to your NCR Account Manager and the Sales Leader for review.
After their review, you will receive a message with either an approval for the registered deal or a rejection with a brief explanation why. If you have any questions, please contact your Channel Account Manager.
Thank you again for the Deal Registration submission.
Regards,
NCR Interact Partner Program Team
